dmca.title: Copyright Claim
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: legal@desikama.com [mailto:legal@desikama.com] 
Posted At: Monday, August 07, 2006 7:24 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Claim
Subject: Copyright Claim


Attn: Copyright agent.

One of your clients has violated Blue Eye Inc's movie copyrights and
posted blue eye inc's images and movies on their site hosted with you.

Enclosed please find the dmca notification in pdf file format. The dmca
notification points out the infringing source. Please ask your client to
remove the infringing source immediately. We appreciate your earliest
action regarding this matter.


Yours sincerely,
Aaron - Legal Dept
